sentences.sContent: Nor is the detriment only to the US industry .
sentences.sContent_eng: Nor is the detriment only to the US industry .
sentences.sCn: 受到损害的不仅仅是美国轮胎行业。

sentences.sContent: Work hard to succeed but not to the detriment of others.
sentences.sContent_eng: Work hard to succeed but not to the detriment of others.
sentences.sCn: 在不损害他人利益的前提下为成功艰苦奋斗。

sentences.sContent: Governments which ignore them, however, do so to their own detriment.
sentences.sContent_eng: Governments which ignore them, however, do so to their own detriment.
sentences.sCn: 然而，政府忽略这些因素就是损害自己的利益。

remMethod.val: de(加强) + tri(擦) + ment → 用力擦 → 损害

words.tran: 有害的人（或物）；不受欢迎的求婚者
